name: detect_image_objects
description: Detect objects in an image using the RapidAPI General Image Detection service. Supports local image file paths or remote image URLs.

image.description: Path to the local image file or a remote image URL. If a local path is provided, it will be uploaded to a hosting service automatically.

save_result.description: Optional. File path to save the JSON result of the detection (e.g., './results/detect.json').
